title: Don’t believe this picture of PM Modi and Prez Trump; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Donald Trump shaking hands while protests and fire rage on in the background has been doing the rounds on social media.

The above picture was widely shared on social media which can be seen here and here.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: This video of a bus driver being attacked is…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above image and found it to be Fake.

When we put it through the Google Reverse Image search, we found the original image of the protests, which is from Jaffrabad.

As we can see, the original picture does not have President Trump or PM Modi at the forefront of it.

We also set out to look at the source of this morphed image. We found that it was first posted by comedian Kunal Kamra.

On digging further we found the original picture of PM Modi and Donald Trump which was superimposed using photo editing software.

The above information proves that the viral image in circulation is FAKE.
